title: my acc got stole
body: i need help to get my acc back please is lvl 30 someone sende me a link i went in and put my id and pw then i got dc and try to log in but they change my pw

replies.body:
Eep! Be careful of any fishy links, as they might be [**phishing links**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iHJ49zbGOW8) in disguise. I'd strongly suggest reaching out to our account team as soon as you can to make sure you get your account secured again. They'll also be able to reverse any damage the hacker might have done as well! 

Reach out to them in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and make sure to pick the option "I need help recovering my account".
